title: Extracting List Tail in Python
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use list slicing in Python to extract all elements of a list except for the first one, and implement a function to achieve this task.

meta.title: Python List Tail | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Learn how to use the list tail method in Python to get all elements in a list except for the first one. Improve your programming skills with our comprehensive tutorials.
